page.title: 14A DAY IN BEMPTON FOR JAMES
page.content: A typical Thursday for me would be to get up at about 7.45 a.m., go downstairs for my breakfast of cereal and coffee, get washed and clean my teeth, then get dressed. Dad takes Zoe and I to school in the car. We put the chairs down from the desks and give out the registers. After assembly we have maths then English, after play it is T.V. then grammar. I then have a packed lunch. In the afternoon we do work connected with the T.V. programme and then we have games. At 3.30 p.m. Zoe and I walk home, I get changed and then play on my computer until tea time. After tea I learn my spellings ready for the test on Friday morning then Zoe and I go to Church for choir practice. We come home and Mum or Dad tests us on our spellings. Then I watch T.V. until bed time, about 9 p.m.
